docs.snippet: Ex-Volkswagen Chairman Ferdinand Piech, who resigned after a showdown with former chief executive Martin Winterkorn, has refused to testify to German lawmakers investigating a possible government's role in the VW emissions scandal, according to hi...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ex-Volkswagen Chairman Ferdinand Piech, who resigned after a showdown with former chief executive Martin Winterkorn, has refused to testify to German lawmakers investigating a possible government's role in the VW emissions scandal, according to his lawyer.

headline.main: Ex-VW Chairman Refuses to Testify in German Emissions Probe
headline.print_headline: Ex-VW Chairman Refuses to Testify in German Emissions Probe

docs.snippet: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said on Sunday the U.N. envoy to Yemen had his full support, days after Yemen's Houthi group asked him not to renew the diplomat's term due to what it said was bias against the Iranian-aligned movement....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said on Sunday the U.N. envoy to Yemen had his full support, days after Yemen's Houthi group asked him not to renew the diplomat's term due to what it said was bias against the Iranian-aligned movement.

headline.main: U.N. Chief Affirms Full Support for Yemen Peace Envoy
headline.print_headline: U.N. Chief Affirms Full Support for Yemen Peace Envoy
